basic_information.scholarship_name: Oklahoma Attorneys Mutual Insurance Company Endowed Scholarship

description: The Oklahoma Attorneys Mutual Insurance Company Endowed Scholarship is open to declare Insurance & Risk Management majors with a minimum 3.0 cumulative GPA. Students must be U.S. citizens. Eligibility Requirements Declared Insurance & Risk Management majors Minimum cumulative GPA of 3.0 or higher U.S. Citizen Award Requirements Once the student is awarded the scholarship he/she will continue to hold the scholarship for a maximum of three years, or until graduation, whichever comes first, provided the following criteria are met: Student maintains a 3.0 GPA Student continues to make progress toward a degree in Insurance & Risk Management

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration
